name: Bug Fixin
description: Fixing bugs is a necessary part of every digital project. But as you're making fixes, it's important to ask yourself, “Am I actually solving the problem, or just resolving the immediate symptom?” If you don't understand the source of your bugs, chances are you aren't making the best decisions on how to deal with them.

name: COMPLETE ANALYSIS
description: Computer systems analysts research the hardware and software that are part of an organization's computer systems in addition to the ways in which the systems are being used.
